description: A beautiful ride with variety of forest service roads (some easy riding, some rugged from ATVs) and single track. Cultas Lake to Tamihi is the most rugged area with the remainder of the ride meandering across Chilliwack Lake Road. Lots of single track, some wide open and some overgrown but still very rideable.
directions: Take Vedder road South into Cultas Lake community and drive up Vance Road This is were FSR begins.
title: Trans Canada Trail
